description: This is a CMake script module providing functions to set up code coverage collection and reporting for CMake-based build systems. It defines utility functions for tasks such as running gcov, gcovr, and lcov tools to generate coverage reports in various formats, and includes configuration checks for coverage tools and compiler settings.

methods.name: setup_target_for_coverage_lcov
methods.description: Sets up a custom build target in CMake to run tests, capture coverage data using lcov, and generate an HTML report, with options for excludes and demangling.

methods.name: setup_target_for_coverage_gcovr_xml
methods.description: Sets up a target that runs gcovr to produce a Cobertura XML coverage report.

methods.name: setup_target_for_coverage_gcovr_html
methods.description: Sets up a target that runs gcovr to produce an HTML coverage report.

methods.name: append_coverage_compiler_flags
methods.description: Utility function to append coverage flags to compiler flags.
